languages.text: "Помнишь ли ты сирот, с которыми я просила тебя когда-то встретиться, Вольный Торговец? Один из мальчиков был сыном убитого мною человека. Я всю жизнь клялась, что не дам злодеям делать имперских детей сиротами — и сделала это сама..."

traits.locale_text: "Помнишь ли ты сирот, с которыми я просила тебя когда-то встретиться, Вольный Торговец? Один из мальчиков был сыном убитого мною человека. Я всю жизнь клялась, что не дам злодеям делать имперских детей сиротами — и сделала это сама..."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Do you remember the orphans I once asked you to meet with, Rogue Trader? One of the boys was the son of the man I killed. My whole life, I had sworn I would not allow villains to orphan children of the Imperium, and then I did so myself..."
languages.original_text: "Помнишь ли ты сирот, с которыми я просила тебя когда-то встретиться, Вольный Торговец? Один из мальчиков был сыном убитого мною человека. Я всю жизнь клялась, что не дам злодеям делать имперских детей сиротами — и сделала это сама..."

traits.locale_text: "Do you remember the orphans I once asked you to meet with, Rogue Trader? One of the boys was the son of the man I killed. My whole life, I had sworn I would not allow villains to orphan children of the Imperium, and then I did so myself..."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Do you remember the orphans I once asked you to meet with, Rogue Trader? One of the boys was the son of the man I killed. My whole life, I had sworn I would not allow villains to orphan children of the Imperium, and then I did so myself..."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「自由開拓者よ、私が以前あなたに会って欲しいよ頼んだ孤児たちを覚えてる？あの中に、私が殺した男の息子がいたのよ。帝国の子供たちを 孤児にするような悪党は許さない、そう誓っていたのに…」
languages.original_text: "Do you remember the orphans I once asked you to meet with, Rogue Trader? One of the boys was the son of the man I killed. My whole life, I had sworn I would not allow villains to orphan children of the Imperium, and then I did so myself..."

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者よ、私が以前あなたに会って欲しいよ頼んだ孤児たちを覚えてる？あの中に、私が殺した男の息子がいたのよ。帝国の子供たちを 孤児にするような悪党は許さない、そう誓っていたのに…」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “你还记得我让你去见的那些孤儿吗，行商浪人？其中一个孤儿的父亲是被我处决的。我曾发过誓，这辈子决不允许帝国的孤儿走上歧途，可现在，我自己却走上了歧途……”
languages.original_text: "Do you remember the orphans I once asked you to meet with, Rogue Trader? One of the boys was the son of the man I killed. My whole life, I had sworn I would not allow villains to orphan children of the Imperium, and then I did so myself..."

traits.locale_text: “你还记得我让你去见的那些孤儿吗，行商浪人？其中一个孤儿的父亲是被我处决的。我曾发过誓，这辈子决不允许帝国的孤儿走上歧途，可现在，我自己却走上了歧途……”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «¿Se acuerda de los huérfanos con los que le pedí que se reuniera, Comerciante Independiente? Uno de los niños era hijo del hombre al que maté. Toda mi vida había jurado que no permitiría que los villanos dejaran huérfanos a niños del Imperium para luego hacerlo yo...».
languages.original_text: "Do you remember the orphans I once asked you to meet with, Rogue Trader? One of the boys was the son of the man I killed. My whole life, I had sworn I would not allow villains to orphan children of the Imperium, and then I did so myself..."

traits.locale_text: «¿Se acuerda de los huérfanos con los que le pedí que se reuniera, Comerciante Independiente? Uno de los niños era hijo del hombre al que maté. Toda mi vida había jurado que no permitiría que los villanos dejaran huérfanos a niños del Imperium para luego hacerlo yo...».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Erinnert Ihr Euch an die Waisen, mit denen Ihr Euch auf meinen Wunsch hin einmal treffen solltet, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}? Einer der Jungen war der Sohn des Mannes, den ich getötet habe. Mein ganzes Leben lang hatte ich geschworen, ich würde nicht zulassen, dass Schurken Kinder des Imperiums zu Waisen machen. Und dann habe ich es selbst getan ..."
languages.original_text: "Do you remember the orphans I once asked you to meet with, Rogue Trader? One of the boys was the son of the man I killed. My whole life, I had sworn I would not allow villains to orphan children of the Imperium, and then I did so myself..."

traits.locale_text: "Erinnert Ihr Euch an die Waisen, mit denen Ihr Euch auf meinen Wunsch hin einmal treffen solltet, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}? Einer der Jungen war der Sohn des Mannes, den ich getötet habe. Mein ganzes Leben lang hatte ich geschworen, ich würde nicht zulassen, dass Schurken Kinder des Imperiums zu Waisen machen. Und dann habe ich es selbst getan ..."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Vous souvenez-vous des orphelins que je vous ai demandé de rencontrer, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ? L'un des garçons était le fils de l'homme que j'ai tué. Toute ma vie, je me suis juré de ne jamais permettre aux ennemis de l'humanité de faire des orphelins dans l'Imperium, et j'ai fini par me rendre moi-même coupable de ce crime... »
languages.original_text: "Do you remember the orphans I once asked you to meet with, Rogue Trader? One of the boys was the son of the man I killed. My whole life, I had sworn I would not allow villains to orphan children of the Imperium, and then I did so myself..."

traits.locale_text: « Vous souvenez-vous des orphelins que je vous ai demandé de rencontrer, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ? L'un des garçons était le fils de l'homme que j'ai tué. Toute ma vie, je me suis juré de ne jamais permettre aux ennemis de l'humanité de faire des orphelins dans l'Imperium, et j'ai fini par me rendre moi-même coupable de ce crime... »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Hür Tacir, seni tanıştırmak istediğim yetimleri hatırlıyor musun? Oğlanlardan biri, öldürdüğüm adamın çocuğuydu. İmparatorluk evlatlarının yetim bırakılmasına asla göz yummayacağıma ant içmiştim. Fakat böyle bir günah işledim..."
languages.original_text: "Do you remember the orphans I once asked you to meet with, Rogue Trader? One of the boys was the son of the man I killed. My whole life, I had sworn I would not allow villains to orphan children of the Imperium, and then I did so myself..."

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir, sizi tanıştırmak istediğim yetimleri hatırlıyor musunuz? Oğlanlardan biri, öldürdüğüm adamın çocuğuydu. İmparatorluk evlatlarının yetim bırakılmasına asla göz yummayacağıma ant içmiştim. Fakat bu günahı kendim işledim..."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
